items.Justification: This paper focuses on human activity recognition using wearables, which is not related to Free Space Optical Communication (FSOC) or adaptive optics.
This paper deals with Coordinated Spectral Efficiency Prediction for real-world 5G CoMP systems, which is not directly related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This paper discusses Adaptive Basis Function Selection for Computationally Efficient Predictions, which is not specifically relevant to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This paper focuses on Multi-periodicity dependency Transformer based on spectrum offset for radio frequency fingerprint identification, which is not related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
